error.title: Reload
error.subtitle: An error occurred while loading the content

validations.min: Masukkan 12 digit nomor IndiHome Anda dengan benar.
validations.not-found: Number you entered is not found
validations.too-many: OTP request limit exceeded, please try again in {{second}} seconds

otp.title: OTP Verification
otp.receiver: OTP has been sent to the number
otp.can-resend-in: You can resend the code in
otp.report: You can report the issue you’re experiencing to us.
otp.number-not-connect-indihome: There is no mobile number connected to your IndiHome account
otp.max-time-submit: You have exceeded the maximum verification limit. Repeat the process in

errors.too-many-request: OTP request exceeded, please try again later
errors.not-found: IndiHome number you entered is not found
errors.unknown: Something went wrong please try again later

active-package-internet: The displayed quota is the total active quota (from the main package / top-up add-on).
If the quota's validity period expires, the displayed quota will be 0.
If the customer tops up multiple times, the displayed quota and validity period follow the most recent top-up.
Each top-up is valid for 30 days.

404.title: Page Not Found
404.desc: Make sure you’ve entered the correct URL. If the issue persists, please contact 188 for assistance.

403.title: Access Denied
403.desc: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this site.

400.title: Invalid Request
400.desc: Sorry, the server could not process the request because it was invalid. There is an issue with how you sent the request.

429.title: Request Limit Exceeded
429.desc: Sorry, the application has exceeded the number of requests allowed within a certain period.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.desc: Sorry, your request has exceeded the time limit, so the server terminated the connection.

409.title: You Have an Unfinished Order
409.desc: Sorry, a new order cannot be placed yet. Please try again once the previous request process has completed successfully.

SSL.title: Unsecure Connection Detected
SSL.desc: This application requires access to a server that does not yet have a security certificate
